title: Basic Finance Math - Research and Equation Collection
description: Research and collect 20-30 fundamental equations for basic finance math including time value of money, compound interest, present/future value calculations, annuity formulas, and discount factors.

title: Markdown Primer Creation
description: Create a comprehensive markdown primer explaining the dataset structure, usage instructions, and examples for each category. Include LaTeX rendering tips and practical applications.

title: Quality Assurance and Validation
description: Perform comprehensive QA on the entire dataset: mathematical accuracy verification, LaTeX syntax validation, category consistency, duplicate checking, and format compliance.

title: Basic Finance Math - Data Structure Definition
description: Define data structures for basic finance math equations including PV, FV, annuity formulas with proper parameter validation and type definitions.

title: CSV Output Format Specification
description: Define the CSV format specification for the financial mathematics equations dataset. Each row should contain: title, LaTeX equation (no delimiters), main category, detailed notes. Ensure proper escaping and formatting.

title: Financial Mathematics Equations Dataset - Complete Project
description: Create a comprehensive dataset of financial mathematics equations covering all major areas of finance including basic math, bonds, stocks, options, futures, swaps, risk metrics, portfolio theory, and derivatives. Output in CSV format with markdown primer.
